About Shaffer Construction, Inc.

At Shaffer Construction, Inc., we are committed to delivering top-tier electrical services with a focus on quality workmanship, safety, and customer satisfaction. Based in Los Angeles, our team of skilled electricians specializes in pioneering electrical solutions that support the evolving needs of homeowners and businesses across Southern California.

Our Core Values

  • Quality Workmanship: We prioritize precision and excellence in every project we undertake.
  • Safety Standards: Protecting our team and clients through strict adherence to safety protocols.
  • Efficiency: Delivering timely solutions that minimize disruptions and maximize performance.
  • Reliability: Building trust through consistent, dependable electrical services.
  • Customer Satisfaction: Ensuring our clients' needs are met with professionalism and care.
  • Pioneering EV Infrastructure: Leading the way in electric vehicle charging solutions for residential and commercial properties.

Our Expertise

Our team brings a wealth of experience in a wide range of electrical services, including:

  • Residential EV Charger Installations
  • Commercial Electrical Solutions
  • Lighting Design & Installation
  • Electrical Upgrades & Complex Projects
  • Energy Efficiency & Optimization

Our dedication to pioneering electrical infrastructure ensures that your property is equipped with reliable, innovative solutions that stand the test of time.

Our Commitment to You

At Shaffer Construction, Inc., we believe that the foundation of our success is rooted in our unwavering commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. We strive to be your trusted partner for all electrical needs, providing dependable, user-friendly solutions tailored to your unique requirements.
